docs.lead_paragraph: China is preparing for 2 million extra babies a year as a result of a loosening of its "one child" birth limits that will allow more couples to have two children, health officials said Thursday.

headline.main: China Planning for Extra 2 Million Babies Per Year
headline.print_headline: China Planning for Extra 2 Million Babies Per Year

docs.snippet: China is preparing for 2 million extra babies a year as a result of a loosening of its "one child" birth limits that will allow more couples to have two children, health officials said Thursday.
